# Data Source: aws_qldb_ledger

Use this data source to fetch information about a Quantum Ledger Database.

## Example Usage

```typescript
// DO NOT EDIT. Code generated by 'cdktf convert' - Please report bugs at https://cdk.tf/bug
import { Construct } from "constructs";
import { TerraformStack } from "cdktf";
/*
 * Provider bindings are generated by running `cdktf get`.
 * See https://cdk.tf/provider-generation for more details.
 */
import { DataAwsQldbLedger } from "./.gen/providers/aws/data-aws-qldb-ledger";
class MyConvertedCode extends TerraformStack {
  constructor(scope: Construct, name: string) {
    super(scope, name);
    new DataAwsQldbLedger(this, "example", {
      name: "an_example_ledger",
    });
  }
}

```

## Argument Reference

* `name` - (Required) Friendly name of the ledger to match.

## Attribute Reference

See the [QLDB Ledger Resource](/docs/providers/aws/r/qldb_ledger.html) for details on the
returned attributes - they are identical.
